name: versions-from-filenames
description: Get package names & versions from filenames (e.g. ['foo-1.2.3.tgz', 'foo-1.3.0.tgz', 'bar-2.0.0.tgz'] -> { foo: ['1.2.3', '1.3.0'], bar: ['2.0.0'] }

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && babel lib --out-dir dist
scripts.watch: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && babel -w lib --out-dir dist

author: David Bj√∂rklund <david.bjorklund@gmail.com>
